+        <div class="center" style="text-align:center; margin:25px 50px 0px 50px">
+            <h1 style="color:rgba(39,52,139,255)"> Enrolling in Your First Undergraduate Degree </h1>
+            <p style="margin-top:20px; margin-left:150px; margin-right:150px; font-size:20px;"> Now that we've learnt all about course requirements, units and majors, let's enrol for our first undergraduate degree! </p>
+        </div>
+        <div id="myCarousel" class="carousel slide" data-ride="carousel" data-interval="false">
+            <ol class="carousel-indicators">
+              <li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="0" class="active"></li>
+              <li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="1"></li>
+              <li data-target="#myCarousel" data-slide-to="2"></li>
+            </ol>
+            <div class="carousel-inner">
+              <div class="carousel-item active">
+                <img class="d-block w-75 caro-image" src="https://www.web.uwa.edu.au/__data/assets/image/0018/2282004/centenary_year.jpg" alt="First slide" >
+                <img class="d block caro-image-overlap" src="https://www.colorhexa.com/27348b.png">
+                <div class="carousel-caption" style="color:white;">
+                    <h1 style="margin-top:10px;"> Enrolling on StudentConnect </h1>
+                    <div class="caro-text" style="margin-top:12px;">
+                        <p> Now that we're all set up, the next step is to simply enrol in our course on UWA's online student hub, StudentConnect. </p>
+                        <p> Start by logging into the StudentConnect site which can be found 
+                                <a href="https://www.uwa.edu.au/students" target="_blank"> here. </a></p>
+                        <ol>
+                            <li> Navigate to COURSE DETAILS > Online enrolment and click on "Begin online enrolment" </li> </br>
+                            <li> Firstly, enter your nominated graduation year and completion period – for most people this would be 3 years (inclusive) from the time you begin your degree. For example, if you began your course in 2022, you would graduate at the end of 2024. </li> </br>
+                            <li> Next, you may select your Unit Sets which relates to your major and second major. You will select your degree-specific major and your second degree major. </li> </br>
+                            <li style="margin-bottom:5px;"> Now refer to your study plan that we made in the previous guide. You will now select your units. You can search up units according to their unit code – e.g., CITS1401. Once you have all the units selected for both semesters 1 and 2, then checkout and those units will now be selected as the first units of your course. Consider first year sorted! </li>
+                        </ol>
+                    </div>
+                </div>
+              </div>
+            <div class="carousel-item">
+                <img class="d-block w-75 caro-image" src="https://www.web.uwa.edu.au/__data/assets/image/0018/2282004/centenary_year.jpg">
+                <img class="d block caro-image-overlap" src="https://www.colorhexa.com/27348b.png">
+                <div class="carousel-caption" style="color:white;">
+                    <h1 style="margin-top:10px;"> Class Allocation System </h1>
+                    <div class="caro-text" style="margin-top:25px;">
+                        <p> Now all that is left is for you to sort out your University timetable on UWA’s class allocation system, also known as CAS. You can access CAS at cas.uwa.edu.au. You can select preferences up to four for which times you would like certain classes (tutorials, labs, workshops, etc.) to be allocated for you. Certain classes such as lectures are often not changeable. </p>
+                        <p> The Class Allocation System will look like the image below. Click on this image to be directed to the CAS UWA website. </p>
+                        <a href="https://www.cas.uwa.edu.au/" target="_blank">
+                            <img style="display:block; width:50%; height:255px; margin-right:auto; margin-left:auto;" src="CASexampleimage.png">
+                        </a>
+                    </div>
+                </div>
+            </div>
+            <div class="carousel-item">
+                <img class="d-block w-75 caro-image" src="https://www.web.uwa.edu.au/__data/assets/image/0018/2282004/centenary_year.jpg">
+                <img class="d block caro-image-overlap" src="https://www.colorhexa.com/27348b.png">
+                <div class="carousel-caption" style="color:white;">
+                    <h1 style="margin-top:10px;"> What's Next? </h1>
+                    <div class="caro-text" style="margin-top:25px;">
+                        <ul>
+                            <li> Congratulations! Now that you’ve finished enrolling at UWA, you can look into getting your own Campus Card! This can be done in-person from Student Central at UWA and the process begins online through studentconnect. </li> </br>
+                            <li> Next, you have the freedom to access your very own student email which, as of 2020, is available on Microsoft Outlook and can also be accessed through studentconnect. </li> </br>
+                            <li> Other things that you can now do involve making your own USI (Unique Student Identifier) and applying for the HECS-HELP loan scheme if you are a domestic student and wish to apply for governmental support for payment of your university course. You will need your tax-file number for this step and the setup is accessible once again through studentconnect. </li> </br>
+                            <li> Finally, attend orientation! Before University begins in February each year, there is a week of orientation for new students to explore the campus, get involved with University Clubs and learn about their course. The key dates for orientation are available on the Unistart website
+                                <a href="https://www.uwa.edu.au/unistart/orientation" target="_blank"> here. </a>
+                            </li>
+                        </ul>
+                    </div>
+                </div>
+            </div>
+            <a class="carousel-control-prev" href="#myCarousel" role="button" data-slide="prev">
+              <span class="carousel-control-prev-icon" aria-hidden="true"></span>
+              <span class="sr-only">Previous</span>
+            </a>
+            <a class="carousel-control-next" href="#myCarousel" role="button" data-slide="next">

+              <span class="sr-only">Next</span>
+            </a>
+            </div>
+        </div>
+    </body>
+</html>

+                        <li> Achieve 144 credit points throughout the duration of your course. Most units will be worth 6 credit points, and in order to complete your course in 3 years, the load is 4 units per semester (full-time). </li>
+                        <ul> 
+                            <li style="margin-left:30px;"> <b> Please note</b>: it is not mandatory to complete your course in 3 years, if you would like to extend one semester or one year, you may distribute your units throughout your degree in order to lighten your unit load per semester.  </li>

+                        <li> Complete at least four units (24 points) outside your degree specific major to satisfy the broadening requirement. </li>
+                        <ul>

commit c655dab7456965c1954eeb76f283d153fffa3c33
Author: RoyalJacky <75690080+RoyalJacky@users.noreply.github.com>
Date:   Sun May 9 00:36:23 2021 +0800

    quiz Javascript + footer additions
    
    remeber to add relevant questions into the javascript a sohail job.

diff --git a/Scripts/quiz.js b/Scripts/quiz.js
index e69de29..8ba1f0f 100644
--- a/Scripts/quiz.js
+++ b/Scripts/quiz.js
@@ -0,0 +1,155 @@
+(function(){
+    // Functions
+    function buildQuiz(){
+      // variable to store the HTML output
+      const output = [];
+  
+      // for each question...
+      myQuestions.forEach(
+        (currentQuestion, questionNumber) => {
+  
+          // variable to store the list of possible answers
+          const answers = [];
+  
+          // and for each available answer...
+          for(letter in currentQuestion.answers){
+  
+            // ...add an HTML radio button
+            answers.push(
+              `<label>
+                <input type="radio" name="question${questionNumber}" value="${letter}">
+                ${letter} :
+                ${currentQuestion.answers[letter]}
+              </label>`
+            );
+          }
+  
+          // add this question and its answers to the output
+          output.push(
+            `<div class="slide">
+              <div class="question"> ${currentQuestion.question} </div>
+              <div class="answers"> ${answers.join("")} </div>
+            </div>`
+          );
+        }
+      );
+  
+      // finally combine our output list into one string of HTML and put it on the page
+      quizContainer.innerHTML = output.join('');
+    }
+  
+    function showResults(){
+  
+      // gather answer containers from our quiz
+      const answerContainers = quizContainer.querySelectorAll('.answers');
+  
+      // keep track of user's answers
+      let numCorrect = 0;
+  
+      // for each question...
+      myQuestions.forEach( (currentQuestion, questionNumber) => {
+  
+        // find selected answer
+        const answerContainer = answerContainers[questionNumber];
+        const selector = `input[name=question${questionNumber}]:checked`;
+        const userAnswer = (answerContainer.querySelector(selector) || {}).value;
+  
+        // if answer is correct
+        if(userAnswer === currentQuestion.correctAnswer){
+          // add to the number of correct answers
+          numCorrect++;
+  
+          // color the answers green
+          answerContainers[questionNumber].style.color = 'lightgreen';
+        }
+        // if answer is wrong or blank
+        else{
+          // color the answers red
+          answerContainers[questionNumber].style.color = 'red';
+        }
+      });
+  
+      // show number of correct answers out of total
+      resultsContainer.innerHTML = `${numCorrect} out of ${myQuestions.length}`;
+    }
+  
+    function showSlide(n) {
+      slides[currentSlide].classList.remove('active-slide');
+      slides[n].classList.add('active-slide');
+      currentSlide = n;
+      if(currentSlide === 0){
+        previousButton.style.display = 'none';
+      }
+      else{
+        previousButton.style.display = 'inline-block';
+      }
+      if(currentSlide === slides.length-1){
+        nextButton.style.display = 'none';
+        submitButton.style.display = 'inline-block';
+      }
+      else{
+        nextButton.style.display = 'inline-block';
+        submitButton.style.display = 'none';
+      }
+    }
+  
+    function showNextSlide() {
+      showSlide(currentSlide + 1);
+    }
+  
+    function showPreviousSlide() {
+      showSlide(currentSlide - 1);
+    }
+  
+    // Variables
+    const quizContainer = document.getElementById('quiz');
+    const resultsContainer = document.getElementById('results');
+    const submitButton = document.getElementById('submit');
+    const myQuestions = [
+      {
+        question: "placeholder Q",
+        answers: {
+          a: "placeholder answer",
+          b: "placeholder answer",
+          c: "placeholder answer"
+        },
+        correctAnswer: "c"
+      },
+      {
+        question: "Placeholder q",
+        answers: {
+          a: "placeholder answer",
+          b: "placeholder answer",
+          c: "placeholder answer"
+        },
+        correctAnswer: "a"
+      },
+      {
+        question: "Who is an undergrad",
+        answers: {
+          a: "placeholder answer",
+          b: "placeholder answer",
+          c: "placeholder answer",
+          d: "placeholder answer"
+        },
+        correctAnswer: "d"
+      }
+    ];
+  
+    // Kick things off
+    buildQuiz();
+  
+    // Pagination
+    const previousButton = document.getElementById("previous");
+    const nextButton = document.getElementById("next");
+    const slides = document.querySelectorAll(".slide");
+    let currentSlide = 0;
+  
+    // Show the first slide
+    showSlide(currentSlide);
+  
+    // Event listeners
+    submitButton.addEventListener('click', showResults);
+    previousButton.addEventListener("click", showPreviousSlide);
+    nextButton.addEventListener("click", showNextSlide);
+  })();
\ No newline at end of file

+                style="width:50%; height:50%; padding:10px; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto;">
+            <img class = "mySlides" class="center" src="https://www.wtravelmagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/23.25.1-View-of-the-Alps-from-Aiguille-du-Midi-mountain-by-Konstantin-Yolshin.jpg" alt="In Winter"
+                style="width:50%; height:50%; padding:10px; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto;">

+        <script>
+            /* Below code from W3Schools Slideshow Tutorial */
+            var slideIndex = 1; 
+            showDivs(slideIndex);
+
+            function plusDivs(n) {
+            showDivs(slideIndex += n);
+            }
+
+            function showDivs(n) {
+            var i;
+            var x = document.getElementsByClassName("mySlides");
+            if (n > x.length) {slideIndex = 1}
+            if (n < 1) {slideIndex = x.length} ;
+            for (i = 0; i < x.length; i++) {
+                x[i].style.display = "none";
+            }
+            x[slideIndex-1].style.display = "block";
+            }
+        </script>
+    </body>
+</html>

diff --git a/quiz-page/script.js b/quiz-page/script.js
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..290944c
--- /dev/null
+++ b/quiz-page/script.js
@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+const draggables = document.querySelectorAll('.draggable')
+const containters = document.querySelectorAll('.container')
+
+draggables.forEach(draggable => {
+    draggable.addEventListener('dragstart', () => {
+        draggable.classList.add('dragging')
+    })
+
+    draggable.addEventListener("dragend", () => {
+        draggable.classList.remove('dragging')
+    })
+})
+
+containters.forEach(container => {
+    container.addEventListener('dragover', e =>{
+        e.preventDefault()
+        const afterElement = getDragAfterElement(container, e.clientY)
+        const draggable = document.querySelector('.dragging')
+        if (afterElement == null) {
+            container.appendChild(draggable)
+        } else {
+            container.insertBefore(draggable, afterElement)
+        }
+
+    })
+})
+
+function getDragAfterElement(container, y) {
+    const draggableElements = [...container.querySelectorAll('.draggable:not(.dragging)')]
+
+    return draggableElements.reduce((closest, child) => {
+        const box = child.getBoundingClientRect()
+        const offset = y - box.top - box.height/2 
+        if (offset < 0 && offset > closest.offset) {
+            return {offset: offset, element: child}}
+        else {
+            return closest
+        }
+    }, {offset: Number.NEGATIVE_INFINITY}).element
+}

+<<<<<<< HEAD
+=======
+        <style>
+        body, html {
+            height: 100%;
+            margin: 0;
+            }
+        
+        .bg-image {
+        /* The image used */
+            background-image: url("https://www.studyoptions.com/sites/default/files/styles/mega_image/public/universities/university-western-australia/university-western-australia-uwagraduations1-3.jpg?itok=L1AbmyKO");

+        /* Add the blur effect */
+             filter: blur(8px);
+            -webkit-filter: blur(8px);
+  
+        /* Full height */
+            height: 90%; 
+  
+        /* Center and scale the image nicely */
+            background-position: center;
+            background-repeat: no-repeat;
+            background-size: cover;
+        }
+        .bg-text {
+            background-color: rgb(0,0,0); /* Fallback color */
+            background-color: rgba(0,0,0, 0.4); /* Black w/opacity/see-through */
+            color: white;
+            font-weight: bold;
+            border: 3px solid #f1f1f1;

+++ b/welcome-login.html
@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+<!DOCTYPE html>
+<html lang="en">
+    <head>
+        <meta charset="UTF-8">
+        <meta name="viewport" content="width = device-width, initial-scale = 1"> 
+        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons">
+        <link rel="stylesheet" href="welcome-style.css">
+        <title>UWA Enrolment and Studies Guide</title>
+    </head>
+    <body>
+        <div id="topNav">
+            <a>UWA Advisor</a>
+            <p>A free guide to enrolment and studying at UWA</p>
+        </div>
+        <div class=mainContainer style="height: 50px; margin-top: 50px; display:none" id="hidden">
+            <p id="msg" style="font-size: small; margin: 10px; text-align: center;"></p>
+        </div>
+        <!--hidden div called demo that is used for propmpt-->
+        <div class="mainContainer" id="mainForm" style="height:300px;">
+            <h1>WELCOME</h1>
+            <div>
+                <form>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">account_circle</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" type="text" id="usrnm" name="usrnm" placeholder="Enter your username"><br>
+                    </div>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">vpn_key</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" type="password" id="pass" name="pass" placeholder="Enter your password"><br>
+                    </div>
+                </form>
+            </div>
+            <div class="optionsContainer">
+                <label>Remember Me
+                    <input type="checkbox" style="display:inline; float:left">
+                    <span class="checkmark"></span>
+                </label>
+                <button onclick="openPopup()" style="float: right; color: blue; background-color: transparent;">Forgot password?</a>
+            </div> 
+            <div class="submitContainer">
+                <button class="button" style="font-size: 15px;" href="homePage.html">Log In</button>
+                <p>Don't have an account?</p>
+                <a href="welcome-registration.html" style="color: blue;">Register here!</a>
+            </div>
+        </div>
+        <script>
+            function openPopup() {
+                var txt;
+                var email = prompt("Please enter your email:");
+                if (email == null || email == "") {
+                    return;
+                } 
+                else {
+                    txt = "An email has been sent to " + email + " explaining how to reset your password. Once completed, please refresh the page to try and login again";
+                }
+                document.getElementById("msg").innerHTML=txt;
+                var reveal = document.getElementById("hidden");
+                reveal.style.display="block";
+            }
+        </script>
+    </body>
+</html>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+<!DOCTYPE html>
+<html lang="en">
+    <head>
+        <meta charset="UTF-8">
+        <meta name="viewport" content="width = device-width, initial-scale = 1"> 
+        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons">
+        <link rel="stylesheet" href="welcome-style.css">
+        <title>UWA Enrolment and Studies Guide</title>
+    </head>
+    <body>
+        <div id="topNav">
+            <a>UWA Advisor</a>
+            <p>A free guide to enrolment and studying at UWA</p>
+        </div>
+        <div class="mainContainer" id="mainForm" style="margin-top:100px">
+            <h1>Registration</h1>
+            <div>
+                <form>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">email</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" type="text" id="email" name="email" placeholder="Enter your email"><br>
+                    </div>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">text_format</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" type="text" id="fname" name="fname" placeholder="Enter your full name"><br>
+                    </div>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">account_circle</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" type="text" id="usrnm" name="usrnm" placeholder="Enter your username"><br>
+                    </div>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">date_range</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" placeholder = "Enter your your date of birth" type = "text" onfocus = "(this.type = 'date')"  id = "date">
+                        <!--onfocus="(this.type = 'date')" allows the placeholder to be seen before clicking-->
+                    </div>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">password</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" type="password" id="pass1" name="pass1" placeholder="Enter your password"
+                        pattern="(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{8,}" 
+                        title="Must contain at least one number and one uppercase and lowercase letter, and at least 8 or more characters" required><br/>
+                    </div>
+                    <div class="inputContainer">
+                        <i class="material-icons">password</i>
+                        <input class="inputField" type="password" id="pass2" name="pass2" placeholder="Enter your password again"><br>
+                    </div>
+                </form>
+            </div>
+            <div class="submitContainer">
+                <button class="button" style="font-size: 15px;" href="homePage.html">Register</button>
+            </div>
+        </div>
+    </body>
+</html>

+                        </div>

+                    </li>
+                </ul>
+            </div>
+        </nav>
+        <div class="container">
+            <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In eu diam mi. Morbi tincidunt lorem vel ligula faucibus tempus. Vivamus tincidunt tortor vitae tellus vehicula, quis consequat sapien suscipit. Proin nec nisl ante. Integer gravida sem urna, nec elementum purus hendrerit non. Donec semper vitae turpis eu volutpat. Fusce a diam dolor.
+
+            Morbi vel suscipit mauris. Vivamus hendrerit velit id nibh dictum, tempor eleifend libero ultrices. Donec eu sem eget felis consectetur sodales nec ut enim. Phasellus id convallis nibh. Fusce gravida erat tellus. Nulla facilisi. Sed aliquet iaculis purus, sed eleifend libero. Sed eu nulla ornare, bibendum nisl quis, rhoncus ante. Sed aliquet nibh non lorem pretium facilisis.
+            
+            Donec molestie nunc enim, egestas lobortis tortor accumsan vel. Duis tincidunt placerat eros, et convallis ligula rhoncus quis. Pellentesque at fermentum neque, nec mattis mi. Nam ipsum elit, scelerisque eget tellus vel, dignissim tempor ex. Donec convallis, dui id consectetur tristique, purus lorem volutpat magna, a varius dolor ante accumsan lectus. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nam luctus ultricies risus, eget pulvinar nibh varius ac. Praesent maximus, enim et placerat sodales, ante lectus scelerisque tellus, quis tempor sapien ex sit amet quam. Vestibulum quis odio nec turpis rutrum bibendum quis quis erat. Nunc id dolor nulla. Cras a pretium neque. Integer dictum erat ac tempor pulvinar. Ut mollis nulla ut enim fermentum, at tincidunt sem hendrerit. Vivamus fringilla a erat vel gravida. Vestibulum eu justo nibh.
